Daniel's Brain: Privacy Policy

Effective date: March 13, 2019

The short version: Daniel's Brain does not collect data that will identify you, or be used or shared with any third party to market products or services to you.

About

Daniel's Brain ("DB", "The Application") is a voice response application for popular services like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant ("Voice Services"). It provides funny sayings and quotations from cast members of the Dudley and Bob Morning show, on KLBJ FM in Austin, Texas. The application has no affiliation with the KLBJ broadcast entity, and is provided by Goody Apps Good, the application development branding of Richard Goodwin ("Developer", "we", "us").

Data Collection

In plain terms, DB does not collect any personally identifiable information (PII). The Voice Services that serve the DB application may collect and provide analytic information so that the Developer can improve the application. This includes anonymous information in the form of how often the application is used, for how long, errors encountered, and what geographical regions the users are using the app from. This is similar to how analytics works for basically any website that is in existence today (March 2019), and is used SOLELY to improve the stability and usability of DB. DB does not serve ads, nor link to any user accounts. The DB website, DanielsBrain.stream, does not use cookies or data collection of any kind to "remember" users, nor does it collect any personally identifiable analytics information. Any data collected through any of the above means will be used SOLELY to:
  • To provide and maintain the Application
  • To notify you about changes to our Service
  • To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Application
  • To monitor the usage of the Application
  • To detect, prevent and address technical issues

Links To Other Sites

Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

Changes To This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
